sentences.en: a campaign to encourage childless couples to adopt
sentences.cn: 鼓励无子女夫妇领养孩子的运动

sentences.en: California has adopted a tough stance on the issue.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州对这一问题持强硬立场。

sentences.en: He tends to adopt a condescending manner when talking to young women.
sentences.cn: 和年轻女子说话时,他喜欢摆出一副高高在上的姿态.

sentences.en: I move that we adopt the agenda as It'stands.
sentences.cn: 我提议不作改变通过这个议程.

sentences.en: I tried to adopt a curled-up position to avoid damaging my limbs.
sentences.cn: 我努力保持蜷曲的姿势以免四肢受伤。

sentences.en: If you want to improve your situation you must adopt a positive mental attitude.
sentences.cn: 如果你打算改变自己的境遇，就必须树立一种积极的心态。

sentences.en: In no way am I going to adopt any of his methods.
sentences.cn: 我绝对不会采纳他的任何方法。

sentences.en: Kim adopts a southern accent when speaking to family back home.
sentences.cn: 基姆和老家的亲人讲话就操南方口音。

sentences.en: Many childless couples adopt children.
sentences.cn: 许多无子女的夫妇收养孩子.

sentences.en: Pupils should be helped to adopt a positive approach to the environment.
sentences.cn: 应帮助学生对环境采取积极的态度。

sentences.en: Sally was adopted when she was four.
sentences.cn: 莎莉四岁时被人收养。

sentences.en: The couple are unable to have children of their own, but hope to adopt.
sentences.cn: 那对夫妇自己无法生育，但希望领养孩子。

sentences.en: The courts were asked to adopt a more flexible approach to young offenders.
sentences.cn: 法庭被要求对少年犯采取更为灵活的处理方法。

sentences.en: The girl was uncertain what to do, or what tone of voice to adopt.
sentences.cn: 女孩不知道该做什么，也不知道该用什么口气说。

sentences.en: The majority of British women adopt their husband's surname when they marry.
sentences.cn: 大多数英国女性结婚后随夫姓。

sentences.en: The only way to come out on top is to adopt a different approach.
sentences.cn: 脱颖而出的唯一途径就是采用一种不同的方法。

sentences.en: The store recently adopted a drug testing policy for all new employees.
sentences.cn: 这家商店近来实行新雇员一律要做药检的政策。

sentences.en: To achieve these ends, we must adopt the above mentioned measures.
sentences.cn: 要达到这些目的, 我们必须采取上述措施.

sentences.en: Try to adopt a more relaxed manner.
sentences.cn: 试着换一种更加放松的方式。

sentences.en: We need to adopt a more pragmatic approach.
sentences.cn: 我们需要采用一种更为实际的方法.

sentences.en: We will adopt their suggestions in mass.
sentences.cn: 我们将全盘采纳他们的建议.
